publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3620 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Housing (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Housing (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time-limits indicated (each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress): Groups 1 to 6 – 55 minutes Groups 7 to 10 – 1 hour and 25 minutes Groups 11 to 15 – 2 hours and 20 minutes Groups 16 to 18 – 2 hours and 55 minutes Groups 19 to 21 – 3 hours and 25 minutes Supported by: George Lyon*
